name: Spin Shot
description:
Shoot at a spinning circle attaching darts to it and getting as many as possible to attach before hitting another and losing.

Multiple levels to choose from ranging in difficulty.

Easy Mode:

Take your time and shoot at a slow-moving and large spinning circle. Get the highest score you can possibly get with minimal effort.

Medium Mode:

Shoot at a slightly smaller and slightly faster spinning circle. Attach as many darts with a bit of thinking and timing.

Hard Mode: 

Really test your ability in attaching as many darts as possible with this mode. Faster spinning and is smaller than either mode. You will have to think and time your shots just right to get the highest score. Can you do it??
